strings.Value: [Try to discern who is depicted on the bas-relief]
{n}This bas-relief depicts what looks like a cloud of smoke with two long, deathly arms extended forth. Its razor-sharp claws are reaching out to grip the face of a terrified cyclops.{/n}

{n}This bas-relief depicts a soul eater — a supernatural creature from the daemonic plane of {g|Abaddon}Abaddon{/g}. An experienced wizard could summon such an entity to send against their enemies — this monster would chase its target until it drains the target's soul or it perishes.{/n}
{n}You can't figure out who or what is depicted here.{/n}

{n}This bas-relief depicts a supernatural being from {g|Abaddon}Abaddon{/g} — a soul eater. It looks like a cloud of smoke with two long, deathly arms extending from it. Its razor-sharp claws are reaching out to grip the face of a terrified cyclops.{/n}
